content: have 17 19 21 sts remaining on left needle row 3 rs sl1 *k1 sl1* 13 15 17 times ssk turn row 4 ws sl1 p26 30 34 sts p2tog turn repeat rnds 3 and 4 until all sts on needle 2 have been worked you should have 28 32 36 sts on needle 2 work across the remainder of sts on needle 2 using the corresponding round from the foot chart so if the last round of the foot chart that you worked across needle 1 was round 25 work round 25 from the foot chart across needle 2 leg see pattern note #4 prior to starting leg ​ work leg according to leg chart for your size working the chart on needle 1 and again on needle 2 until work measures approx 2 inches / 5 cm shorter than desired height if you finished the previous round with a round 25 from the foot chart your next round will be round 26 from the leg chart for best visual end after completing a round 25 31 33 of the chart then work the following two rnds round 1 *c2r k24 28 32 c2l* twice round 2 sl 1 k26 30 34 c2r k to last st on needle c2r using last st of round and first slipped st of round arrange sts so that the first st of round is the first on the needle this will be the first st already worked of the first cuff/rib round ~*~ to end approx halfway through the chart stop after completing a round 12 16 16 of the chart then work the following two rnds for 56 and 72 st socks only for 64 st sock move on to cuff after completing round 16 round 1 *c2r k24 -- 32 c2l* twice round 2 sl 1 * yo k2 slip yo over two sts and off of needle k2* 6 -- 8 times yo k2 slip yo over two sts and off of needle c2r * yo k2 slip yo over two sts and off of needle k2* 6 -- 8 times yo k2 slip yo over two sts and off of needle c2r using last st of round and first slipped st of round arrange sts so that the first st of round is the first on the needle this will be the first st already worked of the first cuff/rib round © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 4 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens cuff in the first round of the cuff the first st is already worked from the previous round if you ended at the end of the chart or in the middle of the chart as described above so slip it without working it then continue with *p2 k2* etc rib k1 *p2 k2* to last 3 sts of needle p2 k1 repeat on second needle work in rib for 2 inches
